Title: Dudes Being Dudes
Plot: The Chi-town boys want to throw Bobby a bachelor party, but can't decide who will be paying for it. Meanwhile, Stephanie's new book steals the headlights when she and PJ attend Elsa's shower, and PJ corners Andy into revealing information on his relationship with Jo.
GuestStars: Adrian Wenner, Nia Vardalos, Gay Storm, Billy Burke, Reggie Austin, Heather La Bella
